com.cronos.im.logic
Class SessionStatusEventListener

java.lang.Object
  com.cronos.im.logic.SessionStatusEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.topcoder.chat.status.ChatStatusEventListener, java.util.EventListener
public class SessionStatusEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.topcoder.chat.status.ChatStatusEventListener

This class implements ChatStatusEventListener. It deals with the session status change of chat application. If it changes to OPEN, do the following steps:

1. If it is a 1-1 session or Sales session (which means two users were added and requires acknowledgement), post the Enter Chat Message directly to both users.

2. For all the requested users, post the Ask For Chat Message directly to the user.

3. For all the users, register a session message pool for the user. Post Presence Message of other users to this user, and post Presence Message of this user to other users.

Thread-safety: this class is immutable and thread-safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
justforplay, TCSDEVELOPER

Method Detail

statusChanged

public void statusChanged(long id,
                          com.topcoder.database.statustracker.Entity entity,
                          com.topcoder.database.statustracker.Status oldStatus,
                          com.topcoder.database.statustracker.Status newStatus)

This method is used to deal with the change of session status. Here's its logic:

1. If it is a 1-1 session or Sales session (which means two users were added and requires acknowledgement), post the Enter Chat Message directly to both users.

2. For all the users, register a session message pool for the user. Post Presence Message of other users to this user, and post Presence Message of this user to other users.

Any exception exception IllegalArgumentException are ignored.

Specified by:
statusChanged in interface com.topcoder.chat.status.ChatStatusEventListener
Parameters:
id - id of concrete entity, any possible int value
entity - Entity instance of the session whose status is changed, it is not null
oldStatus - old status of entity, Status instance, null is possible
newStatus - new status of entity, Status instance, null impossible
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if entity or newStatus parameters are null
